This is glorious. I could literally feel my asshole pulsing.

The plot is enough to be a part of a bigger series but it doesn't leave out so much stuff that the story wouldn't make scenes without other chapters the art is amazing the way of using the slime was genius and also the way it appealed to the main tags was pretty good tho I think that the scenes feel a bit slow the translation was also awesome overall I would give it 8/10 and if I go personally I think the combination of fetishes was really great but the slowness really pushed it down a notch 7/10 for personal preference

Interesting plot. Somewhat unbelievable, but not too bad overall. The mild scat scene was unexpected and turned me off a little, but the pages after it were great at regrabbing my attention and piquing my interest again. Decent artwork, overall a 5.7/10
